item.title: Issue Temporary Credentials for Roles Corresponding to User Pool Groups with Token/Rule-Based Mapping in Cognito Identity Pool
item.description:
Cognito Identity Pool can issue temporary AWS credentials to users authenticated by IdPs such as User Pool.

CDKでCognito UserPoolとClientを作成しトリガーやFederationを設定する - sambaiz-net

const identityPool = new cognito.CfnIdentityPool(this, 'IdentityPool', {
  identityPoolName: 'test-identity-pool',
  allowUnauthenticatedIdentities: false,
  cognitoIdentityProviders: [{
    clientId: userPoolClient.userPoolClientId,
    providerName: userPool.userPoolProviderName,
  }],
});

The IAM Role for issued credentials can be configured either Token-based using the cognito:preferred_role claim from the group with minimum precedence or cognito:roles claim + CustomRoleArn, or Rule-based using any claim.

item.title: Add Entra ID to AWS IAM identity provider and sign in with SAML
item.description:
Entra ID supports authentication via SAML in addition to OIDC.

Authenticating with Google Accounts using Microsoft Entra ID - sambaiz-net

While you can create and configure an app from scratch, you can skip settings by selecting the AWS Single-Account Access app from the app gallery.

Enable SAML in the SSO settings. Note that RoleSessionName only accepts a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@-, so map to other fields as needed.

item.title: Authenticating with Google Accounts using Microsoft Entra ID
item.description:
Microsoft Entra ID (formerly Azure Active Directory) is an authentication and authorization platform that, like Amazon Cognito, supports both built-in user management and third-party SAML/OIDC providers. While pricing is charged per user, Azure’s EntraID Free can be used at no cost.

Create an OAuth client in Google Cloud and obtain the Client ID and Secret.

The Authorized URIs to register with the client include the tenant (directory) ID and domain name xxx.onmicrosoft.com.
